wikipedia_page.main: William Stewart Maxwell (born 24 December 1963) is a Scottish National Party (SNP) politician.  He was the Minister for Communities and Sport from 2007 to 2009 and a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the West of Scotland region from 2003 to 2016.

response: At the 2016 Scottish Parliament election, Macintosh lost the Eastwood constituency, being pushed into third place behind the Conservatives' Jackson Carlaw and the Scottish National Party's Stewart Maxwell. However, Macintosh was returned as an additional member on Scottish Labour's West Scotland regional list.

link_mentions.page: West of Scotland (Scottish Parliament electoral region)
